extendedInfo.description: A fast and easy word helper! Perfect for games like Scrabble, Wordfeud, Wordsmith and Words with friends.Enter your letters and optional filtering. Use * for blank letters. Wordwell searches through a huge database to find words you can create with your letters. You can sort found words by the score they would produce in Scrabble or Wordfeud, or by the word-length.Wordwell has the following dictionaries: English, French, German, Dutch, Danish, Swedish and Norwegian. The word lists are stored online, keeping the app-size minimal.Cheating? This app can be used to cheat, but please use only for educational purposes! ;)This is the free version with a limitation of 20 returned words, but you can search as many times as you want.28.
